headline.main: QUEZON LEAVES HERE FOR SUMMER REST; Says Japanese Never Will Gain Control of Philippines

lead_paragraph: President Manuel Quezon of the Philippine Commonwealth left New York yesterday with his wife and three children for Lynchburg, Va., where he intends to spend the Summer resting under doctors' orders.
abstract: Quezon on Filipinos resistance to Japanese
